ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Generates a Digital (Step) Band Series chart in code
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Generates a digital Band Series chart in code, by using a [url='https://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/The%20Band%20Series%20Type.html']FastBandRenderableSeries[/url] with the IsDigitalLine property set to true. The band series requires an [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting~SciChart.Charting.Model.DataSeries.XyyDataSeries%602.html']XyyDataSeries[/url], which contains one X-point and two Y-points.
Dual lines are drawn by Stroke, StrokeY1 and shaded bands are drawn using FillY1 and Fill, depending on whether Y1 is greater than Y2.
[b][i]Tip![/i][/b]
If you have data where Y1 is greater than Y2 always, you'll get an envelope effect. Great for rendering confidence intervals, error margins or Bollinger Bands!
